faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What types of projects do you work on?
faq.a1: We specialize in music composition and sound design across film, television, commercials, video games, podcasts, and new media. Our team has experience with projects ranging from intimate documentaries to major studio productions.
faq.q2: How long does a typical project take?
faq.a2: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A typical commercial might take 1-2 weeks, while a feature film score could take 2-4 months. We always work closely with your deadlines and production schedule.
faq.a3: Absolutely! We work with clients worldwide through secure file sharing, video conferencing, and real-time collaboration tools. Distance is no barrier to creating exceptional music together.
faq.q4: What's included in your music packages?
faq.a4: Our packages typically include original composition, professional recording, mixing and mastering, stems delivery, and usage rights. We customize each package based on your specific needs and budget.
faq.q5: Can you work with our existing team?
faq.a5: Yes! We love collaborating with directors, producers, sound mixers, and other creative professionals. We're flexible and can adapt to any workflow or creative process.
